name: project-list
description: Easy access and switching between projects with options

useCache.title: Use cached data
useCache.description: Dump list of project to cache file. Useful if scans used.

checkExists.title: Existing items only
checkExists.description: Add item to list only if one or more of its paths exist.

windowTitle.title: Add project title to window title
windowTitle.description: If a list of open folders matches a project paths, then add project title to window title.
